archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Choose Forecast Model
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Brief Description Choose which forecast model is the most relevant to be used, from a range of qualitative and quantitative ones available Extended Description Choose which forecast model is the most relevant to be used, from a range of qualitative and quantitative ones available. Qualitative models - Used where data is scarce. For example - Consumer or user survey - Panel of executive opinion - Salesforce composite, built up from internal areas - Delphi - Bayesian decision theory - Product testing/Test marketing Quantitative models - Used when there is a base of historical data to draw on. For example - Time series analysis - Causal techniques
